mapper.insert: insert into sys_logininfor (login_name, status, ipaddr, login_location, browser, os, msg, login_time) values (#{loginName}, #{status}, #{ipaddr}, #{loginLocation}, #{browser}, #{os}, #{msg}, sysdate())
mapper.select:
select info_id,login_name,ipaddr,login_location,browser,os,status,msg,login_time from sys_logininfor
AND ipaddr like concat('%', #{ipaddr}, '%')
AND status = #{status}
AND login_name like concat('%', #{loginName}, '%')
and date_format(login_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(login_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')

select sys_logininfor.login_name, sys_logininfor.msg, sys_user.user_name, sys_dept.dept_name, sys_role.role_name, sys_logininfor.ipaddr, sys_logininfor.login_location, sys_logininfor.browser, date_format(sys_logininfor.login_time,'%m月%d日 %T') as loginTime, (select count(sys_logininfor_2.login_name) from sys_logininfor as sys_logininfor_2 where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(login_time) AND sys_logininfor.login_name = sys_logininfor_2.login_name )as times from sys_logininfor as sys_logininfor,sys_user,sys_dept,sys_user_role,sys_role where sys_logininfor.login_name = sys_user.login_name AND sys_user.dept_id = sys_dept.dept_id AND sys_user_role.user_id = sys_user.user_id AND sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role.role_id order by info_id desc limit 0,10

select ANY_VALUE(sys_user.user_name) as user, count(sys_logininfor.login_name) as cn from sys_logininfor, sys_user where sys_logininfor.login_name = sys_user.login_name and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(login_time) and sys_logininfor.status = 0 group by sys_logininfor.login_name order by cn desc limit 0,5

select login_location as name, count(login_location) as value from sys_logininfor where not login_location = '内网IP' and not login_location = 'XX XX' group by login_location order by count(login_location) desc limit 0,5

select substr(login_location,4) as name, count(login_location) as value from sys_logininfor where not login_location = '内网IP' and not login_location = 'XX XX' and not login_location = '湖南 长沙' group by login_location order by count(login_location) desc
select user_name as un, date_format(create_time,'%m月%d日')as ct from sys_user order by create_time desc limit 0,5
